main_image.prompt: Young East Asian man, early 20s, sharp angular features, intense dark eyes, messy black hair in a loose ponytail, lean muscular build, wearing torn simple traveler's clothes, subtle scars on hands, determined cold expression, standing victorious over a fallen orc warrior in a dark fantasy forest, blood-stained rusty sword in hand, dramatic lighting from above, golden hour sunlight piercing through dense forest canopy, mist and dust particles in the air, epic cinematic composition, western fantasy illustration style, highly detailed, masterpiece quality, 16:9 aspect ratio, book cover art style
main_image.negative_prompt: text, letters, words, writing, watermark, anime style, cartoon, chibi, low quality, blurry, deformed, modern clothes, contemporary fashion, bright cheerful colors, cute, kawaii
main_image.composition: 무영이 쓰러진 오크 위에 서있는 구도. 전경에 무영, 중경에 오크 시체, 후경에 어두운 숲. 위에서 내려오는 극적인 조명.
main_image.setting: 아르테시아 대륙 숲속, 첫 전투 직후

thumbnail.hook_text: 모든 것을 잃은 검객, 이세계에서 다시 시작하다
